quotes.quote: Even if you do learn to speak correct English, whom are you going to speak it to?
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: The English language was carefully, carefully cobbled together by three blind dudes and a German dictionary.
quotes.author: Dave Kellett

quotes.quote: If the English language made any sense, a catastrophe would be an apostrophe with fur.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: England and America are two countries separated by a common language.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The English have no respect for their language, and will not teach their children to speak it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Every English poet should master the rules of grammar before he attempts to bend or break them.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Here will be an old abusing of God's patience and the king's English.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
